Class TestGlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • Geometry.Rect
      • Sprite

  • public class TestGlider
extends Sprite
    The hang glider itself.
    Author:
    Chris Martin

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TestGlider.Simulated_mouse
      A "simulated" mouse to have a slight input delay and limit, so the game is harder.

      • TestGlider

        public TestGlider(double x,
                  double y,
                  int h,
                  int w,
                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
        Constructor for a hang glider. Needs bounding rect size and image.
        Parameters:
        x - double
        y - double
        h - int
        w - int
        img - BufferedImage

      • TestGlider

        public TestGlider(TestGlider tg)
        Constructor, to copy hang glider. Makes code more readable in places where the hang glider is restarted. Results in a slightly more memory intensive code, however.
        Parameters:
        tg - Another TestGlider

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public double tick(int mouse_y)
        The per-frame tick of the hang glider.
        Parameters:
        mouse_y - Y position of the mouse
        Returns:
        X component of the velocity, double

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draw the sprite as an actual hang glider with trails. The glider is rotated to face its direction of movement.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Sprite
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object to draw to
